YUSUF1.original: Get a boat from the ~y~marina.
Lose the cops.
The Buzzard helicopter is on a yacht located to the west of Happiness Island.
YUSUF1.translated: 秃鹰直升机停在幸福岛西侧的一艘游轮上。

YUSUF1.original: Get back to the ~r~yacht~s~ before the arms dealers escape.
YUSUF1.translated: 在军火商逃走前回到~r~游轮~s~上。

YUSUF1.original: ~r~You abandoned the chopper.
~r~The chopper was destroyed.
~s~Hold ~INPUT_VEH_HANDBRAKE_ALT~ to fire the miniguns. Press ~INPUT_VEH_ATTACK2~ to fire rockets.
YUSUF1.translated: ~s~按住~INPUT_VEH_HANDBRAKE_ALT~使用机枪。按下~INPUT_VEH_ATTACK2~发射火箭弹。

YUSUF1.original: Yusuf has provided a ~b~boat~s~ to get to the yacht.
YUSUF1.translated: Yusuf给了一艘~b~船~s~让你前往游轮。

YUSUF1.original: Take out the ~r~reinforcements.
Take out the fleeing ~r~arms dealers.
~s~Get in the ~b~chopper.
When in a helicopter, an altimeter will appear over the radar. This indicates your height above sea level.
YUSUF1.translated: 驾驶直升机时，小地图上会显示高度计，指示当前的海拔高度。

YUSUF1.original: ~r~The arms dealers got away.
You may find it easier to use the miniguns to destroy the boats. Hold ~INPUT_VEH_HANDBRAKE_ALT~ to fire the miniguns.
YUSUF1.translated: 使用机枪更加容易击沉船只。按住~INPUT_VEH_HANDBRAKE_ALT~使用机枪。

YUSUF1.original: ~s~Destroy the ~r~yacht.
You may find it easier to use the miniguns to destroy the boats. Hold ~INPUT_VEH_ATTACK3_KB~ to fire the miniguns.
YUSUF1.translated: =使用机枪更加容易击沉船只。按住~INPUT_VEH_ATTACK3_KB~使用机枪。

YUSUF1.original: Watch out for patrolling boats protecting the yacht.
YUSUF1.translated: 当心保护游轮的巡逻艇。

YUSUF1.original: ~s~Hold ~INPUT_VEH_CIN_CAM~ to focus the camera on the patrol boat.
Take the chopper to the ~y~helipad.
YUSUF1.translated: 驾驶直升机前往~y~停机坪。

YUSUF1.original: ~s~Approach the yacht quietly to avoid alerting the patrol boat.
YUSUF1.translated: ~s~悄悄接近游轮，避免惊动巡逻艇。

YUSUF1.original: Get on board the ~b~yacht.
Steal the ~b~chopper.
~s~Hold ~INPUT_VEH_ATTACK3_KB~ to fire the miniguns. Press ~INPUT_VEH_ATTACK2~ to fire rockets.
YUSUF1.translated: ~s~按住~INPUT_VEH_ATTACK3_KB~使用机枪。按下~INPUT_VEH_ATTACK2~发射火箭弹。

YUSUF1.original: You were spotted by the patrol boat.
The ~r~arms dealers~s~ are fleeing on foot.
